website_summaries.verdict: For those who value a long zoom lens, AA batteries, and saving a few bucks, the Nikon Coolpix L820 might be your point-and-shoot.
pros: The Nikon Coolpix L820 has better features than you'd expect for its price, including a 30x zoom lens, a high-res 3-inch LCD, and a backside-illuminated CMOS sensor
It's one of the few cameras that is powered by AA batteries
cons: The L820's autofocus performance is on the slow side when the lens is zoomed in or in low light or indoors
Shooting performance is not quite fast enough for fast-moving kids and pets

customer_reviews.title: My first Nikon and I'm loving it
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Being raised on 35mm cameras, I was afraid that this one would be too automatic and not allow enough control. I have to admit, after taking hundreds of pictures with this, it hasn't bothered me at all. Great optics, nice natural color rendition, and good features. I've taken macros of spiders filling the frame, and even hand held super long shots of both the super moon and the blood moon that were exposed almost perfectly. Clear crater outlines around the rim of the moon. Impressive. Love that 30x zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Good zoom
customer_reviews.text: This is a good camera, great for the money. The zoom is excellent. The color is ok, but not great. The clarity or sharpness is good, but not great. Overall a good camera. I was surprised at it size, smaller than I had expected. Compared to a smart phone..this is way better, no comparison really. However, it's still just a point and shoot camera..I do like taking nature photographs and having a camera with a good zoom is nice to have. (not worrying about carrying around a bunch of expenses lenses a definite plus in my book). However, I don't think I'll be happy until I step up to a DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: wazel

customer_reviews.title: Great for capturing baby and kid photos!
customer_reviews.text: For someone new to photography, this is a great camera. We purchased this camera because we had a baby on the way and wanted to make sure we could get quality photos without spending an arm and a leg for a professional to take them. We are very pleased with this purchase. We have made canvas prints from the photos as well and they are flawless. We have been able to stage and capture wonderful photos, I can't say enough about this camera. We have used the video only a handful of times, but the quality on those works as well. I would say, always pack extra batteries and extra memory card, just in case!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It's a very nice point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice point and shoot camera. I like having nice pictures but I'm not committed enough to invest in a whopper of a camera that I have to mess with to take a picture. This one has lots of settings that are easy to toggle between and the pictures are very nice--especially compared to the cell phone pictures that everyone else has. I do appreciate the heft of the camera sometimes, but I guess my only complaint is that because it takes AA batteries it makes it kind of heavy. It's definitely something I have to plan around when I bring it somewhere. It takes very nice video too.
customer_reviews.author: lizpride

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera Ever Bougth
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this camera by a friend who showed me photo's that he took at night with little light that I could not duplicate with my Cannon SRL camera. Even indoor shots in a semi-dark room came out very clear and bright. Although the camera was knocked off a table and no longer works as before, I still recommend this camera to any novice that is into taking pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G.

customer_reviews.title: I definitely think it's a great camera for people who want a nicer but not ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this camera for my brother who travels abroad a lot. It was a quality buy for a college student on a budget. The specs are respectable and the content is quality. I definitely think it's a great camera for people who want a nicer but not too expensive camera, people who are getting into photography, etc. The price is fair for this littler camera and the resell price isn't too bad once you're looking to upgrade. Makes for a great gift and my brother loves the small travel size!
customer_reviews.author: Imanie Patel

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for Multiple purposes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to have a lightweight camera for wide angle, telephoto and macro applications. I have a Canon DSLR and it is great for serious photography but heavy to carry around to have the flexibility of telephoto and normal pictures, and the cost of the wide angle lens is pretty high (>$400). This camera takes great pictures and has lots of presets, as well as some nice special effects such as slow motion video. And compared to my DSLR is a lot lighter to carry to achieve comparable results. Would recommend to anyone looking for a good all around camera at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Neis

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good camera - comes with internal memory and can also accept an SD card. It can record movies, and the file plays readily on the computer without any conversion or special software. Just plug the camera into the computer and open windows explorer to find the files in the camera. What doesn't it have? 1. The lens is not threaded for a filter. I like to add a UV or skylight filter for the sole purpose that in an accident I prefer the cheap filter to scratch instead of the lens. 2. No viewfinder. One watches the LCD display instead. I also like that it a standard tripod can screw into the bottom of this camera.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Great camera at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This may not be the greatest camera available, but for an advanced amatuer it's nearly perfect. Both stills and video come out clear and crisp. It's a point-and-shoot when that's all you need yet has advanced settings and functions for when you feel more creative. The focal length allows for well-focused close shots as well as distant images. It's light and easy to hold. Downloading images to Picasa or another application is as easy as connecting a USB cable or inserting the memory card in your reader. It takes standard AA batteries. In summery, it's an easy to use camera that doesn't require an advanced degree in photography. But if you have one you'll likely enjoy using it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jack C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera. The packaging was fine and had no signs of wear and tear and the product was exactly as presented. At first I was hesitant about the camera quality because the photos would come out slightly dim or dull but after playing around with the features and scene settings I was able to capture crisp and clear photos. The camera is very functional and easy to use. I would recommend the camera for outdoor use as the pictures really jump when taken in natural lighting. The zoom feature is also on par. For the price you couldnt asl for a better camera!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: um...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving two stars because if the light is just right, and you are holding super still, you can get nice images. Otherwise I'm super disappointed. I hoped it was just me, but I'm good with cameras, so let's be honest. Most of the time the images were blurry or too bright. If they did turn out okay then they were probably fuzzy at a 5x7. Eesh. I'm disabled so I don't get out much. I played at home, and at family gatherings, and was very happy other cameras were around. If the camera can't handle the small things, like two people next to each other, or a cat sitting by a window, I need something else.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Simple & Clear
customer_reviews.text: I am not a techy person and I hate a lot of buttons on my camera. I take simple pictures for my listings and pictures of my family. This camera is PERFECT for all of that. Simple to use. Simple to handle. Simple to upload pictures. My only complaint is the battery life. In the year I've had this camera I have had to replace the batteries 6 times. I turn it off immediately after using and don't have it on for long periods when I am using it, so the battery life is a little frustrating but overall it's a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Action Shots Blur even w/ special settings
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my fiancée as a Christmas gift. She had been using her smartphone as a camera and moving shots are really blurry. The same blurry motion shots are what I get with this camera. I read all the instructions, and it even has specific settings for motion but they don't really help. I think it's safe to say that if you want action shot performance, you need to step up and spend the money. This camera takes great still shots and the video works great too. I'm just saying, do not expect high end performance from a budget priced camera.
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: Nikon COOLPIX is not so "Cool".
customer_reviews.text: Nikon COOLPIX is not so "Cool". Lens fogs up constantly. I had to purchase one of those Nikon little rags to wipe some of the condensation away. Also it does not do well in poor light situations. With the flash everyone and thing looks washed out. Without the flash, like at concerts photos come out dark and blurry. Not sure if I need to reread the manual of if these are flaws of this particular model. Also, this one takes AA batteries instead of the rechargeable camera batteries. This camera was pretty expensive, for the money I would NEVER buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: MY LITTLE TAKE ANYWHERE CAMERA.
customer_reviews.text: Although I have 2 Canon Rebels which I take on my trips I keep this little guy in my car for unexpected photos. It's a fun, easy to use camera.....Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Smolinski

customer_reviews.title: You'll Love this Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my daughter who moved to Wyoming to work for the Summer. Her older pocket sized digital camera just didn't have adequate zoom. Wow, does this camera solve that problem. Working in Grand Teton National Park and regularly visiting Yellowstone, she has had many opportunities to photograph wildlife with this camera and it hasn't disappointed her (or me). The 30x zoom works great and there's no comparison to the small pocket sized cameras. Keep in mind that this is not a "pocket" camera. That great zoom lens requires a little more bulk, but if you want to take great pictures from a distance this camera fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Randy F. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable point-and-shoot superzoom for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera for just having around. I can find nothing to complain about in regard to the picture quality or the quality of the camera's build. The whole thing is light and provides long battery life, especially if you want to change the screen brightness to the lowest setting. Speaking of settings, the camera options and picture-taking options are well laid-out and numerous. The high-speed and low-speed burst options are so useful to have in basically any situation. I personally almost always have them on since the images process so quickly anyway. They are especially useful for subjects such as birds or insects. All-in-all, there isn't anything to criticize about this camera for the range it's in.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost In a Jar

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend to anyone who wants to take great looking pictures without the cost of added lenses or high grade equipment! It take professional grade pictures quickly and effortlessly! arrived a day sooner than expected, great because it was an xmas gift! wife absolutely loves it! the auto focus is crazy with clarity and the zoom, well its insane! only downside is the slightly flimsy battery lid but this wont be an issue with the optional charger and rechargeable batteries! if anyone is wondering, as i was, the lens is not changeable, but with the equipped lens, its not a problem for most. completely blown away by the 30x zoom.
customer_reviews.author: David Worthington

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought myself a Christmas present this year and I have been quite happy with it. This camera is small enough that it doesn't feel cumbersome to carry around, and it's fairly light weight so it isn't heavy around your neck. The quality of my zoom shots now is incredible. I am totally blown away with how much detail I can get. I'm still learning and playing with the various features and have yet to perfect the timing for live-action shots to get exactly the kind of picture I want, but that will come with practice. But so far, I have been super happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna75

customer_reviews.title: sturdy camera for quick photography
customer_reviews.text: very good photo quality that can allow for large blow-up photo shots. I use this for on-site work. cannot tell difference from my SLR Nikon if used for simple photography.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Buhrmaster

customer_reviews.title: bought used, works perfect, simple to use...
customer_reviews.text: still a lot of capabilities and posibilities for great pictures and short movies. No excessive technicalites, but very practical features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mid Level Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is basically a very powerful point and shoot. You see something you want to take a picture of, you just point and shoot. It is great for someone that wants to take high quality pictures but doesn't quite have the skill or ability to use a more advanced DSLR or whatever other camera you may choose. If you are looking for a good vacation camera for an average leveled picture taker look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for my Kodak Easyshare
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to replace my Kodak that not only takes great photos, but videos as well. I have a friend who replaced the same model Kodak I had with the Nikon COOLPIX L820 and was very happy with it, so that's why I chose this camera. I use it every day and am extremely happy with the results I'm seeing. I take a lot of video at live shows that feature LOUD bands, so the audio is really important. My husband and I co-host a radio show that features local bands/musicians and the audio is good enough for me to convert and play on the radio.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Eissinger

customer_reviews.title: upgrading to this camera...
customer_reviews.text: First thing is the color; it's really sharp looking, it's a patent red or wine w/black ...very nice! Second is of course the range of zoom = 30x. Third is that you can take pictures in 'any' lighting or 'any' time of day. The rest are just as amazing features like; clarity, 3" screen, large hand grip for holding the camera & many,many other features. It's just a great camera. Oh I forgot, it runs on batteries. (You don't have to charge it!!!)
customer_reviews.author: CheeseHead

customer_reviews.title: Takes good pictures
customer_reviews.text: Well, obviously, you buy a camera for the picture quality. This camera does that well. Easy point and shoot. Pretty idiot-proof ;) There is a flaw, but not major; the battery door is obnoxiously stiff and hard to open. If you travel a lot, I think this is a good choice because it is very light. It has held up better than I ever thought it would since it is almost all plastic. I really enjoy the extreme close-ups it takes. Some are quite lovely. For example, I got up super close to a milkweed pod and it got all the seeds and silk in great definition.
customer_reviews.author: Yrofthetiger

customer_reviews.title: This camera is worth everything
customer_reviews.text: Despite that the battery is not rechargeable but I never regret it. This camera is amazing. All the languages included, Great quality and it is not draining the battery like any other models. Durable and great quality. I am very happy with it. Shipping with these guys was very decent and quick. No damages especially I bought two units from them. It came with lens cover, Lanyard, set of battery and manual. It only need a memory card and you good to go immediate. I am very highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Al mahdy

customer_reviews.title: Superb camera!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband but didn't want to spend a fortune so I bought it refurbished. Well, it is perfect! Works great! We have a lot of wildlife around our home and this gets every detail of them. You can even see the distinct strands of fur and the whiskers on the deer. I read that it pays to buy refurbished because it's usually a problem with the packaging or a small problem that can be fixed easily. Second refurbished product I bought and would definitely buy another. My husband can't praise this camera enough. He is so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Varela

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures, not the best design
customer_reviews.text: This makes great images for a point and shoot camera, with great colors and details. Also, the time between two images is very short and the menu is very prompt. The only thing I don't like is the design - while it is relatively functional, it is not the most aesthetically pleasing. For the money I'd expect a little better (and the images here are not showing it from all angles). Also I don't like the fact that I need to deal with charging batteries again (I liked the built-in one on my old camera). Anyway, this all is not enough to take off a star--this camera DOES take amazing pictures.
customer_reviews.author: MrCookie

customer_reviews.title: This Coolpix L820 is the BEST
customer_reviews.text: Nikon I love your L820-Just what I needed to compliment my community activist activity, Good response with the HD and the night vision availability with this camera I sometimes forget there is a flash system within the camera. To me this product can be used by real professionals because it provides all you need and I mean under whatever conditions you find yourself having to record the environment you don't have to rely on an SLR because you have SLR availability without having to change lens.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Zoom Lens and Full HD
customer_reviews.text: The perfect 1st camera for me. Full HD, 16MP, with 30x Zoom Lens with that price is just perfect. I was originally going to buy the Sony RX100 or a Canon T3i but I did not want to drop that amount of money on a camera and then have to buy all the lenses for it. There are a lot of cameras out there better than the Coolpix L820 but, it all comes down to what you are using it for. I use it to shoot youtube videos and take amateur photos of electronic components (small resistors and PCBs).
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to use and takes great still pictures. The zoom is really good, allowing to get great shots at a distance. My main issue with this camera, as others have stated, is taking shots with any bit if motion at all. They always turn our blurry, even with the least bit of movement. I have tried multiple settings, including the sports setting, and also tried changing ISO, but not much difference. I would not recommend this camera for general purpose, if you only plan to take scenery and still shots then it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, camera for a trip to Alaska especially to photograph animals at a distance. I am very impressed with the quality. The 30x zoom gave me a sharp picture and the stabilizer keep everything in focus even at the longest length. Easy to use with self explanatory controls, especially if you've owned a digital point and shoot. I had a Canon Powershot which was over six years old and has a shorter zoom lens. It still worked great but was heavier and the stabilizer wasn't as good. Highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Drizzella MO

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a camera that would allow us to zoom more and have more setting options for pictures. We love to travel and camp/hike so wanted to capture great pictures. We did a lot of research and this camera had the best reviews and features for this type of camera. This isn't an SDR camera and you don't have the option to switch lens. However, you can zoom 30x and do 360 degree pics. We have had this camera for about 2 months and have loved the pictures so far. They are very crisp pictures. Some of which I took from a moving car :)
customer_reviews.author: waitforit

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera in 2013
customer_reviews.text: I really really liked this camera. But I got it two years ago. I'll bet Nikon makes something even better now. That's the only reason why I put 4 instead of 5 stars. You can do a lot with this camera -- so much that you really don't need to change lenses (unless it is for very specialized professional shots). I thought the menu could have been better designed.
customer_reviews.author: jmm

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal mid level camera
customer_reviews.text: A definite step up from the "credit card" point and shoot cameras. It has a nice selection of features and an excellent configuration. The controls are intuitive to me and the battery life is great. I needed something better than a "credit card" camera but didn't need a DSLR. This is a wonderful middle ground camera. I would suggest this for folks that know cameras a bit. For the beginning user, I would highly suggest reading the manual through. (It is clear and easy to read and find the info you are after.) All in all, a great camera and at a better price point than others in its category.
customer_reviews.author: Austin T

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. I had been looking for a point and shoot camera with long zoom capabilities for a while. I researched numerous products and brand and could not find what I really wanted for the $$$ I was willing to spend. The Nikon cool pix is everything it promises to be. User friendly, great looking, lots of great features and versatile. I recommend it to the occasional, vacation like photographer . It would have gotten a 5th star if it wasn't for the cheap material they used for the body and the inexistent carry case.
customer_reviews.author: Mvidal59

customer_reviews.title: Good camera decent price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good camera. The only downside i have found with it so far is the battery life is real short expecially when your uploading pictures to your computer it can die within a couple of hours so just be sure to shut it off when not in use. Also If your going to buy this camera I would reccomend you get some recharable battereis and a charger because of the low battery life. OTher than that crystal clear picture. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for great price.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera for Christmas after looking at many different cameras and many different reviews. I must say for the price I paid this is an excellent point and shoot camera with many options. I bought the camera so I could get good quality photos of my family and it more than serves its propose. Although I haven't had it long I haven't had any issues with the camera. Just make sure you remove the lens before you turn the camera on!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Not for indoor photography or kids
customer_reviews.text: This rated well on Consumer Reports and I was impressed with the zoom options, so I bought it without much other research. However, it did not take good pictures in real life. I am a hobbyist and understand indoor photography is tricky; however, the images were often blurry. Additionally, the flash was very harsh; the flash output cannot be adjusted (lowered) at all. It does not work for us because we often take pictures of kids. I am returning it for another camera.
customer_reviews.author: EU

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera and it's very good. The Full HD 1080p pictures are very nice. The 30x zoom is amazing... I was able to zoom in extremely up close to branches of trees that were far away. Everything about the camera is easy to use. There's also an HDMI cable to hook the camera up to your HDTV and see your pictures and videos on your HDTV. There's also a cord to hook the camera up to your computer and see your pictures and videos on your computer. This camera was definitely worth the $196 I paid for it. I recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I had to learn to use it before I appreciated it...
customer_reviews.text: It took time to master the scenes needed for a specific shot... A lot of pictures dumped, and a lot of frustration... After 6 months, finally most of the pictures are beautiful with minimal touch-ups with iPhoto. The videos are clear and truly HD. Make sure you use an SD10 card with it.
customer_reviews.author: HomeSch Mom

customer_reviews.title: a real step above a point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this camera a full five stars, and I still might in a few months, but for now I consider it a four. It is surely a step above a point and shoot camera with its excellent len and zoom capability. It recovers quickly so taking pictures at a family gathering, especially with little children is quite good. This is not a camera that you can switch to manual to make your own settings, however, there are many settings that I've only just begun to fool with. Overall I'm quite pleased with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Pupkis

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace my 6 year old Cannon Sureshot. I absolutely love it. My only one true complaint is the flash. You have to manually open it when you need it. It would be great if it could sense when you need it and open on its own like my 15 year old Nikon D40. Also it does not take good pics in very low light. My daughters are in beauty pageants and this camera is awful taking pics of them on stage when I am only sitting 3-4 rows from the stage. With all that said, it's a GREAT camera!! I do recommend rechargeable batteries or else you may go broke.
customer_reviews.author: CLS012

customer_reviews.title: A little help or advice would be best. Thanks again
customer_reviews.text: It is very similar to the one I used to have but the only problem I have with it is sometimes it takes photos continuously but then after a while it doesn't snap a picture and I don't know why this is. A little help or advice would be best. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Walters

customer_reviews.title: The photos are brilliant compared to what I can capture with my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Nikon has created a camera that does it all! An HD video recorder (1080p), a very high resolution still camera, and loads of features for easy downloads and creating error-free shots (e.g. eliminate red-eye, an incredible 30X zoom). Priced under $200, the cost benefit is very high. I was incented to purchase this camera when my sister showed it off in a recent trip. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Chen

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Have had it a year now and still going strong. Uses 4 AA batteries. Doesn't eat them up to fast, but I do carry extras in my bag. Clear pictures, does well in low light and fast movement. I have not used all the bells and whistles, it just takes good pictures and that's what I need. Easy to use, for anyone who has run a digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: Scarletgilla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this camera. I was able to take a picture of the "Blue" Moon a couple of weeks back and zoomed all the way in. No wash out, no white moon. You could see the craters on it! And, I was hand holding it at night to get this shot. It takes beautiful pictures all the way around. So far I am very happy with it. I would recommend this camera to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, I have had it for four months now, have used it several times and I'm very happy with it. I sell handmade miniatures and jewelry online and a good camera is very helpful to show the details on my items; also I love taking pictures just as a hobby and I couldn't be any happier with it. This camera works great; the pictures come out so clear and pretty, I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: angie_sanz

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Camera is only good in the right light conditions, making it impossible to take good pictures when indoor or with low light without the flash. It's almost imposible not to take shaky pictures. Do not even try because you might end up frustrated. When in low light and without flash, it takes worst pictures than my cell phone. The person who designed how the lenses protrude when you turn on the camera on, and how it hits the lenses cover if you forget to take it off before, should be fired and I hope he never designs a camera again. The only thing that is very very good is the 30x Zoom
customer_reviews.author: Julio Baibe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera!
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this camera! it take beautiful pictures! I had a kodak easy share before this and I wanted to upgrade to something with instant shutter speed to keep up with my active 2 yr old. This looks very professional and did I mention it takes beautiful pictures? I read all the reviews and shopped very carefully since I wanted to make sure it was worth 200 bucks. I am very glad that I chose this camera. You will be too!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not "top of the line" but a great little digital camera, none-the-less! It takes beautiful photos at a decent resolution so larger sized prints should be fairly good quality. It's pretty strait forward to use, I didn't even read the booklet and I've managed to figure out the features in one or two uses. Dropping the photos onto my computer was super easy too. Over all, for a hobbyist photographer on a budget, it's a pretty good camera.
customer_reviews.author: G Naoma R

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix 16MP CMOS Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon L820 exceeds my expectations. Having one lens that can range from a good wide angle to a super zoom is an incredible convenience. I never want to go back to the days when I lugged around multiple heavy lenses and had to stop and change lenses for various needs. The ability to shoot in low light is awesome. The antishake ability allows me to use the zoom without a tripod even though I am 71 years old. The only problem with the camera is the size...not that it is very large or heavy by any means but it will not fit in my pocket. Can't have everything. Joel Saland, Albuquerque, New Mexico
customer_reviews.author: Joel S Saland

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Quality in a Small Package
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the amateur photographer. Covers all bases from wide angle to 50X zoom without the necessity to carry extra lenses. Simple, intuitive controls in a package small enough to keep with you at all times. Nikon quality.
customer_reviews.author: darnolddawg

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I have a Nikon DSL, and I love it, but I wanted something a little simpler to use for some occasions. This camera takes beautiful pictures and is very easy to use. It is especially good for very low light conditions. And the price is right. My only complaint, and others have mentioned it, is that the battery case is tricky to get open and shut. Otherwise I am enjoying it. In my experience you can't go wrong with Nikon, and this is a very good starting point.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera, make sure the specs match your needs.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic digital camera that does everything we (my SO and I) need it to. I do advise however that you get 4 rechargeable batteries. I don't know if I would enjoy it as much as I do if I had to go run and get batteries every week (because we use it quite often for merchandise, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love the Camera
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something smaller than a more professional type camera and I have the small Coolpix but wanted better quality pictures, so I decided on this camera. It has many photo settings and most stuff I have no clue on how to use. It took great pictures and movies. I love the stabilization setting since many times I was taking photos out of the car window.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I think the COOLPIX L820 is by far one of the best in this category. The COOLPIX L820 is easy to use/operate and it just simply takes great pictures and video. This is the only camera I own and I use it everyday. The only down-side in my opinion is the batteries. Gone are the flat, rectangle rechargeable batteries (needing only one) to 4 x AA. I change batteries frequently.
customer_reviews.author: M. Levine

customer_reviews.title: Great for taking lots of photos!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this camera lets me take as many pictures as I want without stopping to process! With my other camera it would take forever to take pictures because I would have to wait for it to sometimes process between every picture. With this camera I haven't had to wait yet, love it! I can take some really closeup pictures of birds in our backyard too. I haven't experimented with it much yet but would recommend it to anyone in general.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma W

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera So Far
customer_reviews.text: I picked this camera because I wanted bells and whistles (1080p video recording, 30X zoom), but also ease of use, a camera that uses the same memory card as my previous camera, uses standard batteries and has an auto setting feature. I've used the auto settings on the camera outdoors (beach), indoors (party) and portraits and all the pictures came out great. In time I hope to use the more advanced settings/features but until then, I'm very happy with the ease of use and quality of the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: CookiStamps

customer_reviews.title: Easy, clear, shots!
customer_reviews.text: Took the camera on a Christmas cruise. It was easy to use and the zoom lens was amazing! Agreed with other reviews that not being able to fit the lens cap back on the lens while extended, was a little annoying, but overall, enjoyed taking pictures with it. It's light weight, so very easy to handle and carry. Did have a little issue with the viewer screen going black when I turned the camera vertically. Not sure why this happened, but worked around it.
customer_reviews.author: VWProv31

customer_reviews.title: The camera is good
customer_reviews.text: In terms of the picture quality, zoom, looks its all good. The only downside is it needs 4 A2 batteries which makes it little difficult to handle when you travel around. I might have omitted this information while buying it. Had it been a product with lithium batteries, it would have been more suitable. 1 and half * less for the battery, otherwise good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Atanu C.

customer_reviews.title: i love the Pictures this Camera takes.
customer_reviews.text: i love the Pictures this Camera takes. this Camera is really easy to use Especially for a beginner in photography.
customer_reviews.author: Syliva Mcghee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am a novice when it comes to photography. I love the out doors, sunsets, animal pictures, concert pictures, etc. I bought this camera solely for the zoom. I am attending a concert, and I want to be sure to be able to take clear pictures from a distance. I have only had this for 2 days, but I absolutely love it. It is easy to use, the design fits in your hand easily, and it takes great pictures. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: krp

customer_reviews.title: It takes good pictures but..
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes good pictures but I can not get good action shots. The dogs, wildlife & any action pictures come out fuzzy for me. I don't know how to adjust the settings to get good action photos. The main reason I bought the camera was for action shots. I have tried sports & several other setting & every thing is still blurred. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Terry C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Photos and Video, Poor Sound on Video. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: I am by no means a photographer but am thrilled with this gem. The price amazon had this for saved me 100$ from the brick and mortar store price. Love the zoom, love the HD video ( even though the sound sucks on the video the picture quality is amazing ), love the simplicity. I am very pleased with the picture quality and the ease of use of this camera. Would highly recommend this to someone who wants a decent camera on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! The only drawback is you have to use the video screen to see what your are photographing or filming. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a good value on a nice piece.
customer_reviews.author: William Norman

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!! LOVE THIS CAMERA!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an mazing camera! I really don't know what else to say! My photos are brilliant! And I am NOT a photographer by any stretch of the imagination. I am very pleased. Thanks to everyone who answered my questions ahead of time about this camera. I was not disappointed in the least and neither will you be. No tho mention the amazing amazon price i got . . . under $180 for this! Brand New Even!
customer_reviews.author: Lifeisgoodforsure

customer_reviews.title: A winner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a Christmas present. She has a compact digital camera that is very handy to carry and use, but photo quality is lacking. For good definition and depth of field, you need a bigger piece of glass. She was not interested in a full systems camera, she wanted it to be simple to use. I like that it used AA batteries, as they are easy to replace without waiting for the recharge. It is still to early to tell how she likes it, as she likes to read all the instructions first. I thought it was very straight forward and could be used right out of the box. Would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fine camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: One disappointment is the way it was packed by Amazon. No packing material what so ever. The camera was just dropped into a box almost twice its size and mailed out. Lucky for me it does not seem to have damaged the camera. So far the camera seems to be working just fine. Since it was a Christmas gift for my wife, she has just started to really get into it, so time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap Nikon
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because I always wanted a Nikon. For the price and characteristics I gave it a try. I am very happy with the definition and the quality of the photos but I am not sure I am doing the right thing when I taking photos to people moving or at night. I don't know almost anything about photography but I could say this is a great cAmera if you know how to use it
customer_reviews.author: J. Gamarra

customer_reviews.title: Very nice digital camera with video capabilities
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my 12 year old daughter who wanted a digital camera that would take videos. Almost bought her a Go-Pro but they don't record sound nor include the LCD viewfinder! This camera is 'all that and a bag of chips' as someone once told me. The red ones are hard to come by, and more expensive, but make it all that more special.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Operate!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a camera pro, so I needed an easy-to-operate camera. The start-up instructions were very easy to understand and the pictures are great. Surprised to see it came with a lens cover, strap, video cables, and USB cable. I did not read that on the site. I highly recommend this great point-and-shoot camera for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sommers

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It does everything I need it to do so far. It could use some improvement in these areas: 1. use the flat square type batteries instead of 4 double As. The ones that it came with exhausted after about 150 shots and frequent playback 2. The continuous sports mode should be faster. I saw a lot of blur on the motion shots. 3. The LCD should allow tilt and fold Being a novice, I don't mind not having manual mode. It takes good pictures with very little effort.
customer_reviews.author: emong

customer_reviews.title: Takes beautiful vacation photos
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this didn't get a 5 star rating is it is a little too big for my purse. I have to have a larger bag than I like to carry, but that said, I LOVE this camera. It is compact, but zooms to 30x, plenty for most vacation photos. The low light setting is great for indoors at night, live action setting for sporting events. The onboard instructions are easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: MONichols

customer_reviews.title: Slow to shoot (as reviewed in other places) but strong in low-light situations
customer_reviews.text: Blows my (7 year old) Olympus Rebel XD away when it comes to low-light situations: goes strong without the need of flash. Built-in flash memory is useful for emergency situations, but only good for a handful of pictures - these days it shouldn't be a problem to increase the built-in flash memory to store at least 50 pictures, probably would only cost $2 more in production. Not ideal in fast-paced environments - there's quite a significant lag when trying to take a shot. But I knew that already as it has been stated in several reviews. Overall a great digital camera for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: CuteMama

customer_reviews.title: Works great, automatic settings make using it easy and takes ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, automatic settings make using it easy and takes sharp pictures. Only draw back is not having separate (additional) eye piece viewer as LCD window hard to see in bright light conditions.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Blurry photos
customer_reviews.text: I have very steady hands and about 9 out of every 10 photos I took with this were blurry. I tried all different types of settings and nothing helped. When I did FINALLY get a photo that wasn't blurry it was always a phenomenal looking shot. However most photos did not turn out well. I returned mine for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camera that I have owned. As a senior citizen,who cannot figure out the high end cameras,this one was so easy to use. I love the quick ready to shoot feature,image stabilization,clear zoom pictures. Controls are very conveniently located. Haven't watched the instruction cd yet,having too much fun taking pictures ! Also took a couple of movies,again control was easily found,easy to implement. Review of pictures quick and easy! Con: hard to see screen in bright light,no viewfinder.
customer_reviews.author: antoinette stropus

customer_reviews.title: A good effizzy....
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a step higher from what I am used to. The high MP pictures ignores any low light. In fact, I protect it so much that I only take it out when I want to take a special shot, such I wouldn't like to lose. The only shortcoming is the use of Ni-MH or alkaline batteries. I wish there's a way to modify it to accommodate Li-ion. For the price, it's a great buy. I recommend it for great memories. every print out of the pics look professional. A friend of mine has just gone for one.
customer_reviews.author: Davechuks

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Camera, Takes great pictures and Video. Multiple quality settings. Types of Pictures settings are great. Comes with batteries and ready to go. The zoom is the best part of this. Best camera for the lowest price. You cant put a lens on it but it is still great. Its just a bit cheaper than the one at bestbuy. The memory cards are way cheaper online.
customer_reviews.author: ha

customer_reviews.title: It's a great easy-to-use point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple to use camera with a lot of zoom to take pictures and videos of a graduation ceremony. I also took the camera on vacation to Hawaii. The pictures are excellent and the video looks absolutely stunning. Cons: If you take pictures in low light conditions without the flash, or videos with a long zoom, the pictures/ videos are blurred. The stabilization in the super easy mode could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes great photos, and that's all that matters, right?
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great photos easily, and that's the only thing I care about. I love that you get a lens that can take wide-angle photos as well as zoom in really close. A fellow reviewer recommended it to me, and I'm so glad he did. This is just the right bridge camera for someone who would love to own a DSLR but can't afford one, like me.
customer_reviews.author: Shevi

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!! What incredible long distance video capability!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to be able to tape my kid singing the national anthem at a huge stadium. i was seated in the nose bleed section, from our seats we could see the boys on the field, but they were like tiny bugs on the field. We zoomed in and could clearly and easily identify our child from the rest, all of the faces were clear. It was truly amazing. when i zoomed out at the end and showed the size of the stadium and the distance from which we were video taping it, people watching the video were astounded. Great camera!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha I.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my girlfriend for her birthday to use on her trip to Hawaii.I researched all brands and read a lot of feedback and this seemed to be the best for the point and shoots. She called today to let me know just how awesome it is and she gave it a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: tim overland

customer_reviews.title: It took nice pictures and liked the video but I expected it ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera in Oct. 2013. Bought the addition insurance which covered the camera for 2 years. Now the camera is 3.5 years old and completely failed. It took nice pictures and liked the video but I expected it to last longer. Checked with Nikon on repair cost, $125.00 minimum plus I pay shipping and it could be more. Disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: SandyA

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera I use it all the time. Takes great pictures of my dogs.easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Love my camera
customer_reviews.text: Love my camera. It is easy to use and gives great pictures. Even though my children love taking pictures with their phones, I have to hide this camera for myself if I plan to get any use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a "purse cam" to capture shots when I don't have time to shot with my K-5. A a filmmaker, photographer and documentarian, having a point and shoot is PRICELESSS!! I'm also a photography tour guide and when someone does not have a camera I put this in their hands. The video in this is awesome, I love the 60p option. I got more than my moneys worth.
customer_reviews.author: KWM

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera!
customer_reviews.text: My dad asked me to order this camera for my mom for Christmas, she absolutely loved it. You can take great pictureswith this camera and it has a lot of features like videoing and the 1080 HD resolution. I woul recomend this camera to anyone who doesn't want to break their wallet for a camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald K Deel Jr

customer_reviews.title: excellent zoom, good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He has enjoyed it thus far. He particularly likes the clear pictures he is getting with the zoom feature. I don't think I'd want a camera this large to lug around, but he is doesn't mind. I have to admit it does take much better pictures than my little old Polaroid digital.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wootton

customer_reviews.title: I truly love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Although I had many troubles with the description of what I ordered and what I actually got, I truly love this camera. It takes great pictures but doesnt cost an arm and a leg like some cameras out there.
customer_reviews.author: Curlgrl24

customer_reviews.title: Great photos
customer_reviews.text: Camera takes excellent photos, love the features and ease of use. 30X zoom is powerful and great for taking photos of subjects normally too far away. Only complaint is the lens cap design is very poor. The lens cap must be removed before turning the camera on, or potential damage to the lens mechanism is likely.
customer_reviews.author: Pete S

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I have always used a Nikon camera, clear back to the 35MM with the small EM. I wanted a good quality, point and shoot for a vacation to Gdansk Poland. This camera perfomed flawlessly and captured the beautiful sites, even at a long distance. For the price this is an awesome camera. Probably will only use this and not it's big brother.
customer_reviews.author: Kiker

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes amazing photos. it's lightweight and easy to use. has a lot of fun filters and modes too if you like that kind of thing. my only drawback is that it takes batteries. so get yourself a battery charger and some rechargeables. For me, that made it a little old school. making it USB rechargeable would have made it far better. but other than that, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Derksen

customer_reviews.title: Camera is easy to use and resolution is marvelous.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to focus. Resolution is fantastic when the pictures transferred to a computer and minute details can be visualized. It is a little hard to get things in the view finder at very high zoom levels when the sun makes it hard to see the screen, but I think that would be true of any camera that does not have a direct view through a lens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great camera for my use and its simple and not ...
customer_reviews.text: great camera for my use and its simple and not complicated. Just what i need for some clean clear picture and some good quality video recordings.
customer_reviews.author: Random

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: It's good camera. Takes nice pictures, great zoom. Umm... Sometimes pictures are blurry, trying to be very still, but can't get it right... Maybe I don't know something.
customer_reviews.author: David Dekanozishvili

customer_reviews.title: This camera works great indoors but take it outside in a little sunlight ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera works great indoors but take it outside in a little sunlight you will have a hard time using the lcd viewer and unfortunately that is the only viewer this camera has. I will never buy another camera without a manual viewer
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. It arrived quickly and in very fine condition. I have been happily snapping pictures of my plants and pets for over three months. It is always handy and gives me what I wanted in a camera. Now if I could just get the pets to be still.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley M. Strong

customer_reviews.title: Nikon
customer_reviews.text: Wish that the battery life was longer in this camera. Did not realize that it took 4 AAA batteries. Had I realized that I would not have bought it. The life of the battery lasts through about 50 pictures and maybe 1 video that is about 10 minutes long.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

product_meta.title: Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Zoom Lens and Full HD 1080p Video (Black) (OLD MODEL)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Style:NewFROM THE MANUFACTURER



The cameras of the Comfort Long Zoom collection provide high-powered zoom and high image quality. Designed with ergonomics in mind, employing features proven to be favorites, these cameras are great for capturing family vacations or everyday moments.

BEAUTIFUL MEMORIES FROM A DISTANCE, EVEN IN LOW LIGHT.
 Capture outstanding photos and Full HD 1080p videos from a distance, even in low light, with the COOLPIX L820. Its superb 30x optical zoom NIKKOR glass lens has both super-telephoto and wide-angle capabilities—zoom in for highly detailed closeups, or zoom out and bring the whole scene into the frame. A 16.0-megapixel low-light CMOS image sensor helps you shoot natural-looking, crisp photos at parties, weddings, concerts and more; and it's ergonomic design features a larger grip and 3-inch LCD for maximum shooting comfort, speed and control. From family reunions to travel, you'll bring home amazing memories with ease.






GET CLOSE FROM AFAR
CAPTURE DISTANT IMAGES WITH A 30X WIDE-ANGLE TO TELEPHOTO NIKKOR ED GLASS ZOOM LENS
Every COOLPIX is designed around a genuine NIKKOR glass lens, the legendary optics that have made Nikon famous. The COOLPIX L820 features a 30x zoom NIKKOR lens that takes you from wide-angle group shots to telephoto close-ups in an instant. And don't worry about a little camera shake—lens-shift Vibration Reduction keeps the shot steady even when your hands are not.

SUPERIOR LOW-LIGHT PERFORMANCE
HIGH-PERFORMANCE CMOS IMAGE SENSOR LETS YOU SHOOT WITHOUT A FLASH
Imagine being able to shoot without a flash at weddings, concerts, parties—anywhere your flash normally fires. You won't have to interrupt a moment to capture it, and your photos and HD videos will look more natural and true to your memory. The COOLPIX L820 performs so well in low light situations that, in most cases, using the flash is optional. Of course, when the lighting is extremely poor and you need a flash, it'll be there.

RECORD SUPERIOR VIDEOS
1080P FULL HD VIDEOS WITH STEREO SOUND FOR DAZZLING MOVIES
If you want a compact camera that shoots stunning HD videos, the COOLPIX L820 delivers. 1080p Full HD means exceptional video quality. Record the action, then connect to an HDTV and watch your videos come alive. A built-in mic records high-quality audio in stereo. Your videos will look and sound phenomenal.



DAZZLE WITH EVERY SHOT
16.1-MP CMOS SENSOR FOR EXCEPTIONAL IMAGE QUALITY AND ENHANCED LOW-LIGHT PERFORMANCE
Create truly exceptional photos and HD videos with the COOLPIX L820. Its high-performance NIKKOR glass lens is paired with a 16.0-megapixel CMOS low-light image sensor for superior image quality, versatility and low-light performance. Your shots will impress even you.
feature_bullets: Powerful 30x zoom that lets you shoot amazing close ups
16 MP CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality and enhanced low light performance
Record videos in Full 1080p HD with stereo sound
Larger ergonomic design for easier handling and comfort

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars971 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
